forgetPwdMessage: Please enter your username and email. You will receive a link to create new password via email.
resetPwdMessage: Please enter your new password and confirm password.
updatePwdMessageExpired: Your password has expired. Please update your password before continue.
updatePwdMessageFirst: This is the first time you've signed-in. Please update your password before continue.
tooLong: {{column}} is too long, please input again.
vehicleRequired: Please select a vehicle from the list.
noVehicleInList: No such a vehicle in the list.
runDistanceminMessage: Run Distance must be greater than or equal to zero.
runDistancenumMessage: Run Distance must be a number.
name: Name
drivercodeRegex:
•  Driver code can contains only characters <A-z>, <0-9> and special charaters ( - _ ).
•  Driver code can contains only 1 (_), and it needs to be followed by a number.
licenceRequired: Please select a licence plate from the list.
licencetypeahead: Select licence plate from the list:
noLicenceInList: No such a licence plate in the list.
confirmPwdError: These passwords don't match. Try again?
noGroupInList: No such a group in the list.
groupRequired: Please select a group from the list.
noDepartmentInList: No such a department in the list.
departmentRequired: Please select a department from the list.
differentPwdRequired: Must be different from the current password.
licenceplateRegex: •  Licence plate can contains only characters <A-z>, <0-9>.
usernameRegex:
•  Username can contains only characters <A-z>, <0-9> and special charaters ( - _ ' . ).
•  Usernames cannot begin or end with (.).
passwordRegex:
To ensure the password security, the password must:
    •  contain at least {{char}} charaters
    •  contain at least {{type}} types of the following characters: <A-Z>, <a-z>, <0-9>, special characters (such as ! $ # % )
    •  CANNOT contain spaces or question marks (?)
noselectedFunc: No User Function has been selected yet. ( At least one function should be selected. )
checkNewDriver: Check if driver code or driver name is already exists.
rosterUpdatedMessage: {{tripCnt}} trip and {{warnCnt}} warning record(s) has been updated.
noDriverInList: No such a driver in the list.
notApplyField: Do not apply the option in query.
emptyField: Query the option with empty data.
comProfile_description: Review the safety score of drivers and vehicles at top level.
vehicleProfile_description: Review the safety score and recommendation for specific vehicle.
driverProfile_description: Review the safety score and recommendation for specific driver.
liveLocation_description: Find the latest location and status of vehicles.
warning_description: Explore the warnings and the travelled history for specific drivers or vehicles.
FCW_recommendation: Please pay attention to the pedestrians / vehicles / obstacles in front and slow down when necessary. Avoid driving towards the pedestrians / vehicles / obstacles with high speed.
LDW_recommendation: Please avoid swerving from driving lane. Give a direction indicator signal before switching lanes.
HMW_recommendation: Please leave a long enough headway between your vehicle and the front vehicle. Avoid staying too close.
AAW_recommendation: Please avoid sudden acceleration when driving.
ABW_recommendation: Please avoid sudden braking. When there is a changing traffic light, save plenty of time for slowing down.
ATW_recommendation: Please avoid cornering with high speed, slow down during cornering when needed.
FDW_recommendation: Please pay attention to road situation during driving, avoid fatigue driving.
CLW_recommendation: Please keep your hands on the steering wheel, avoid calling on phone during driving.
DTW_recommendation: Please pay attention to the front road situation during driving, avoid distracted driving.
NDW_recommendation: Please ensure the normal operation of DMS visual sensor.
YW_recommendation: Please get sufficient sleep before driving, avoid fatigue driving
mileage-def-2: - Only accept positive integer or positive number with 1 decimal place.
notificationSwitch: Email Notification for {{item}} has been turned {{status}}.
warnvideoDownloadTextarea: Please input video ID in here. (Maximum accepted: 50 video ID)
filenameRegex: Filename can allows underscore ( _ ) special charater only.
filenameLength: Filename should not be longer than 100 characters.
inputVideoId: Input valid Video ID(s) to download.
limitVideoIdCnt: Maximum accepted: 50 video ID. Please verify and try again.
warnexport-def-1: - Check the corresponding box to apply the filter.
warnexport-def-2: - Warning Date is allowed to select a maximum range of 1 year.
warnexport-def-3: - All the select type filters allow multiple selection.
warnexport-def-4: - All the input type filters only accept positive integer or positive number with 1 decimal place.
warnexport-def-5: - If you want to apply multiple related filters, please apply it according to the sequence (check Help Page for more information).

withoutGPS: The selected warning do not have GPS location.
